title: Add explicit Men filter suggestions (Shirt / Red / Floral) on Search UI

requirements.summary: Expose clear selectable/suggested filter values on the Search page (Men: item type Shirt; all: color Red; pattern Floral) and ensure selections populate Results query params.
acceptanceCriteria: When the user navigates to the Search page with category set to Men, the UI provides a clear selectable/suggested option for item type "Shirt".
When the user is on the Search page, the UI provides a clear selectable/suggested option for color "Red".
When the user is on the Search page, the UI provides a clear selectable/suggested option for pattern "Floral".
Selecting/entering these values and running the search navigates to Results with itemType=Shirt, color=Red, pattern=Floral populated in the query/search params.

file_operations.description: Add a small 'Suggested' UI section near the relevant inputs: show an item type suggestion of "Shirt" when category is Men, plus always-available suggestions for color "Red" and pattern "Floral". Implement suggestions as clickable controls that set the corresponding input state (and keep the existing free-text inputs). Compose existing shadcn/ui components (e.g., Button and existing Card/Input/Label usage) for the suggestion chips; do not edit anything under frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
